title: AI-Utilized Strategies for Personalized Learning: Strengthening Manager/Leader Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Understanding of Educational Technology (EdTech)
context.additional_context: For corporate training managers/leaders in science fields, emphasizing AI-based personalized learning system implementation and operational capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three core features of AI-based personalized learning tools and their educational applications.
Learners can execute step-by-step processes to design customized learning pathways by analyzing learner data.
Learners can evaluate macro (organizational policy) and micro (learner characteristics) factors when introducing AI in corporate settings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
